        EffectsDescription carthaginian_adm_car_lvl_9_effects_desc

        Epithet carthaginian_adm_car_lvl_9_epithet_desc
        Threshold  9 

        Effect NavalCommand  4
        Effect TroopMorale  4
        Effect MovementPoints  14
        Effect LineOfSight  3

Trait GoodCommander

    AntiTraits BadCommander

    Level Confident_Commander
        Description Confident_Commander_desc
        EffectsDescription Confident_Commander_effects_desc
        GainMessage Confident_Commander_gain_desc
        Threshold  1 

        Effect Command  1 

    Level Good_Commander
        Description Good_Commander_desc
        EffectsDescription Good_Commander_effects_desc
        GainMessage Good_Commander_gain_desc
        Threshold  2 

        Effect Command  2 

    Level Superior_Commander
        Description Superior_Commander_desc
        EffectsDescription Superior_Commander_effects_desc
        GainMessage Superior_Commander_gain_desc
        Threshold  4 

        Effect Command  3 

    Level Great_Commander
        Description Great_Commander_desc

;== TRIGGER DATA STARTS HERE ==

;== Start Egermejster Trigger == by redact kotLeon
;~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~


;------------------------------------------

Trigger starting_Birth_Of
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber =  0 

    Affects Birth_Of_Count_t01  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger Birth_Of_t_k01
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge


    Affects Birth_Of_Count_t01  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger Birth_Of_t_k02
    WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage


    Affects Birth_Of_Count_t01  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger Birth_Of_t_k03
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption


    Affects Birth_Of_Count_t01  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger Birth_Of_Artaxarta_2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition SettlementName Artaxarta
          and Trait Birth_Of_Count_t01 = 1

    Affects Birth_Of_Count_t01  -1  Chance  100
    Affects Birth_Of_Artaxarta_1  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

Trigger AmountWin_9_3
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition BattleSuccess >= close
          and WonBattle
          and Trait AmountWin73_81 > 0
          and Trait AmountWin73_81 < 9

    Affects AmountWin73_81  1  Chance  100

Trigger AmountWin_0_1
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and Trait AmountWin0 = 0
          and Trait AmountWin1_9 = 0
          and Trait AmountWin10_18 = 0
          and Trait AmountWin19_27 = 0
          and Trait AmountWin28_36 = 0
          and Trait AmountWin37_45 = 0
          and Trait AmountWin46_54 = 0
          and Trait AmountWin55_63 = 0
          and Trait AmountWin64_72 = 0
          and Trait AmountWin73_81 = 0

    Affects AmountWin1_9  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger AmountWin_0_2
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsAdmiral
          and WonBattle
          and Trait AmountWin0 = 0
          and Trait AmountWin1_9 = 0
          and Trait AmountWin10_18 = 0
          and Trait AmountWin19_27 = 0
          and Trait AmountWin28_36 = 0
          and Trait AmountWin37_45 = 0
          and Trait AmountWin46_54 = 0
          and Trait AmountWin55_63 = 0
          and Trait AmountWin64_72 = 0
          and Trait AmountWin73_81 = 0

    Affects FixingAdmiral  1  Chance  100 
    Affects AmountWin1_9  1  Chance  100

;===============================================================
;                     ÃŒƒ”À‹ √”¡≈–Õ¿“Œ–— Œ… —»—“≈Ã€
;===============================================================


;------------------------------------------
Trigger CommandSettlement_5_2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and Trait CommandSettlement37_45 > 0
          and Trait CommandSettlement37_45 < 9
          and GovernorBuildingExists >= governors_house

    Affects CommandSettlement37_45  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger CommandSettlement_5_1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and Trait CommandSettlement28_36 = 9
          and Trait CommandSettlementCount = 1
          and GovernorBuildingExists >= governors_house

    Affects CommandSettlement28_36  -18  Chance  100
    Affects CommandSettlement37_45  2  Chance  100
    Affects CommandSettlementCount  -1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger CommandSettlement_5_0
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and Trait CommandSettlement28_36 = 9
          and Trait CommandSettlementCount = 0
          and GovernorBuildingExists >= governors_house

    Affects CommandSettlementCount  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger CommandSettlement_4_2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and Trait CommandSettlement28_36 > 0
          and Trait CommandSettlement28_36 < 9
          and GovernorBuildingExists >= governors_house

    Affects CommandSettlement28_36  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger CommandSettlement_4_1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and Trait CommandSettlement19_27 = 9
          and Trait CommandSettlementCount = 1
          and GovernorBuildingExists >= governors_house

    Affects CommandSettlement19_27  -18  Chance  100
    Affects CommandSettlement28_36  2  Chance  100
    Affects CommandSettlementCount  -1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

          and Trait CommandSettlement19_27 = 9

          and GovernorBuildingExists >= governors_house

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Triumth_Pretendent_1
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition FactionType romans_julii
          and I_NumberOfSettlements romans_julii > 14
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_TurnNumber > 100
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and Trait Triumth_julii = 0

    Affects Triumth_Pretendent_julii  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Triumth_1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionType romans_julii
          and EndedInSettlement
          and Trait Triumth_Pretendent_julii = 1
          and I_NumberOfSettlements romans_julii > 14
          and I_TurnNumber > 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists = imperial_palace

    Affects Triumth_Pretendent_julii  -10  Chance  100
    Affects Triumth_julii  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Triumth_Pretendent_2
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition FactionType romans_scipii
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and I_TurnNumber > 100
          and I_NumberOfSettlements romans_scipii > 14
          and Trait Triumth_scipii = 0

    Affects Triumth_Pretendent_scipii  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Triumth_2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionType romans_scipii
          and EndedInSettlement
          and Trait Triumth_Pretendent_scipii = 1
          and SettlementBuildingExists = imperial_palace
          and I_TurnNumber > 100
          and I_NumberOfSettlements romans_scipii > 14

    Affects Triumth_Pretendent_scipii  -10  Chance  100
    Affects Triumth_scipii  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Triumth_Pretendent_3
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition FactionType romans_brutii
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and I_TurnNumber > 100
          and I_NumberOfSettlements romans_brutii > 14
          and Trait Triumth_brutii = 0

    Affects Triumth_Pretendent_brutii  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionType romans_brutii
          and EndedInSettlement
          and Trait Triumth_Pretendent_brutii = 1
          and I_TurnNumber > 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists = imperial_palace
          and I_NumberOfSettlements romans_brutii > 14

    Affects Triumth_Pretendent_brutii -10  Chance  100
    Affects Triumth_brutii  1  Chance  100

Trigger Roman_career_01
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition CultureType roman
          and WonBattle
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait AmountWin1_9 = 5
          and Trait NoteRange = 1

    Affects Roman_career  1  Chance  100
    Affects NoteRange  -1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

Trigger Roman_career_02
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition CultureType roman
          and WonBattle
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait AmountWin10_18 = 3
          and Trait Roman_career = 1

    Affects Roman_career  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

Trigger Roman_career_03
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition CultureType roman
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait career_Count_Battle > 0
          and Trait career_Count_military > 0
          and Trait Roman_career > 1

    Affects Roman_career  1  Chance  100
    Affects career_Count_military  -1  Chance  100
    Affects career_Count_Battle  -1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

    Condition WonBattle
          and Trait AmountWin46_54 = 7

    Affects career_Count_Battle  1  Chance  100

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WonBattle
          and Trait AmountWin46_54 = 3

    Affects career_Count_Battle  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WonBattle
          and Trait AmountWin37_45 = 8

    Affects career_Count_Battle  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WonBattle
          and Trait AmountWin37_45 = 4

    Affects career_Count_Battle  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

Trigger career_Count_Battle_03
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WonBattle
          and Trait AmountWin28_36 = 8

    Affects career_Count_Battle  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

Trigger career_Count_Battle_02
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WonBattle
          and Trait AmountWin19_27 = 9

    Affects career_Count_Battle  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WonBattle
          and Trait AmountWin19_27 = 1

    Affects career_Count_Battle  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WonBattle
          and IsAdmiral
          and Trait AmountWin10_18 = 3

    Affects career_Count_Battle  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WonBattle
          and IsAdmiral
          and Trait AmountWin1_9 = 5

    Affects career_Count_Battle  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition IsAdmiral
          and Trait FixingAdmiral > 0

    Affects career_CountAdmYear  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

          and Trait career_CountAdmYear = 9
          and Trait career_Count_MP = 8

    Affects career_Count_MP  1  Chance  100

          and Trait career_Count_MP = 0

;------------------------------------------

Trigger NoLearn_t1_B
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition CultureType barbarian

    Affects NoLearn  1  Chance  20

;------------------------------------------

Trigger NoLearn_t1
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition not CultureType barbarian

    Affects NoLearn  1  Chance  1

;------------------------------------------

Trigger NoLearn_t2_B
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition CultureType barbarian

    Affects NoLearn  1  Chance  20

;------------------------------------------

Trigger NoLearn_t2
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition not CultureType barbarian

    Affects NoLearn  1  Chance  1

;------------------------------------------

Trigger LuernAcademy_t3
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists = ludus_magnus
          and Trait LuernAcademy >= 7
          and Trait LuernAcademy < 9

    Affects LuernAcademy  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

Trigger LuernAcademy_t2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= scriptorium
          and Trait LuernAcademy >= 5
          and Trait LuernAcademy < 7

    Affects LuernAcademy  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

Trigger LuernAcademy_t1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and Trait LuernAcademy < 5
          and Trait NoLearn = 0

    Affects LuernAcademy  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

;          ŒÕ≈÷       ÃŒƒ”À‹ Œ¡”◊≈Õ»ﬂ      ŒÕ≈÷

;------------------------------------------

Trigger Learn_Diplomat_t3
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and AgentType = diplomat
          and SettlementBuildingExists = ludus_magnus
          and Trait Learn_Diplomat = 4

    Affects Learn_Diplomat  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

Trigger Learn_Diplomat_t2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and AgentType = diplomat
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= scriptorium
          and Trait Learn_Diplomat >= 2
          and Trait Learn_Diplomat <= 3

    Affects Learn_Diplomat  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

Trigger Learn_Diplomat_t1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and AgentType = diplomat
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and Trait Learn_Diplomat <= 1
          and Trait NoLearn = 0

    Affects Learn_Diplomat  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and AgentType = spy
          and SettlementBuildingExists = ludus_magnus
          and Trait Learn_Spy = 4

    Affects Learn_Spy  1  Chance  100

          and AgentType = spy

          and Trait Learn_Spy <= 3

    Affects Learn_Spy  1  Chance  100

          and AgentType = spy
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and Trait Learn_Spy <= 1
          and Trait NoLearn = 0

    Affects Learn_Spy  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger V0010_Standard_Battle_Attacker_Crushing_Victory_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5

    Affects GoodAttacker  2  Chance  100 
    Affects TacticalSkill  1  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger V0020_Standard_Battle_Attacker_Crushing_Loss_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5

    Affects BadAttacker  2  Chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger V0030_Standard_Battle_Defender_Crushing_Victory_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition not WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5

    Affects GoodDefender  2  Chance  100 
    Affects TacticalSkill  1  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger V0040_Standard_Battle_Defender_Crushing_Loss_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition not WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5

    Affects BadDefender  2  Chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger V0050_Standard_Battle_Attacker_Clear_Victory_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = clear
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5

    Affects GoodAttacker  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger V0060_Standard_Battle_Attacker_Clear_Loss_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = clear
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5

    Affects BadAttacker  1  Chance  50 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition not WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = clear
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5

    Affects GoodDefender  1  Chance  100

          and IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = clear
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5

    Affects BadDefender  1  Chance  50

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleOdds < 1.6

    Affects GoodCommander  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleOdds >= 1.6
          and BattleOdds < 2.1
          and BattleSuccess >= clear

    Affects GoodCommander  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleOdds > 1.5

    Affects BadCommander  1  Chance  50

          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds < 0.5
          and BattleOdds > 0.16

Trigger V0190_Withdraw_Before_Battle_Even_Odds_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest PreBattleWithdrawal

    Condition IsGeneral
          and I_WithdrawsBeforeBattle
          and BattleOdds > 0.8
          and BattleOdds < 3

    Affects IndecisiveAttacker  1  Chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger V0200_Withdraw_Before_Battle_Good_Odds_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest PreBattleWithdrawal

    Condition IsGeneral
          and I_WithdrawsBeforeBattle
          and BattleOdds > 3

    Affects IndecisiveAttacker  2  Chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger V0210_Standard_Battle_Crushing_Victory_Infantry_Commander_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and PercentageUnitCategory infantry > 80

    Affects GoodInfantryGeneral  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and PercentageUnitCategory infantry > 80

    Affects BadInfantryGeneral  1  Chance  50 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and PercentageUnitCategory cavalry > 50

    Affects GoodCavalryGeneral  1  Chance  100

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and PercentageUnitCategory cavalry > 50

    Affects BadCavalryGeneral  1  Chance  50

Trigger V0250_Worthy_Of_Adoption_1_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption


    Affects GoodCommander  3  Chance  33 
    Affects GoodAttacker  2  Chance  17 
    Affects GoodDefender  2  Chance  17 
    Affects GoodSiegeAttacker  2  Chance  17 
    Affects Brave  3  Chance  17 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger V0250a_Worthy_Of_Adoption_2_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption


    Affects Drink  1  Chance  8 
    Affects Sobriety  2  Chance  12 
    Affects Disciplinarian  2  Chance  17 
    Affects GoodAdministrator  6  Chance  17 
    Affects PlainRomanVirtue  1  Chance  17 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger V0250b_Worthy_Of_Adoption_3_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption


    Affects BattleScarred  1  Chance  17 
    Affects Loyal  1  Chance  17 
    Affects Intelligent  1  Chance  8 
    Affects NaturalMilitarySkill  1  Chance  8 
    Affects GoodCommander  1  Chance  80 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage


    Affects GoodCommander  3  Chance  33 
    Affects GoodAttacker  2  Chance  17 
    Affects GoodDefender  2  Chance  17 
    Affects Brave  1  Chance  17 
    Affects PlainRomanVirtue  1  Chance  17

Trigger temple_of_fun_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_fun_temple

    Affects Drink  1  Chance  10 
    Affects Gambling  1  Chance  10 
    Affects Arse  1  Chance  2 
    Affects Girls  1  Chance  5 
    Affects Perverted  1  Chance  5 
    Affects PublicFaith  1  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger drink2_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= tavern

    Affects Drink  1  Chance  5 
    Affects Gambling  1  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger sitting_around_town_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and RandomPercent > 90

    Affects Drink  1  Chance  1 
    Affects Gambling  1  Chance  1 
    Affects Arse  1  Chance  1 
    Affects Girls  1  Chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger sitting_around_camo_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition not EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and RandomPercent > 60

    Affects Feck  1  Chance  1 
    Affects HaleAndHearty  1  Chance  1 
    Affects Scout  1  Chance  1 
    Affects Feck_NR  1  Chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger temple_of_love_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_love_temple

    Affects Girls  1  Chance  5 
    Affects PublicFaith  1  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger dads_a_bit_drunk_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait Drink >= 1
          and FatherTrait Drink <= 2

    Affects Sobriety  3  Chance  50 
    Affects PhlegmHumour  1  Chance  20 
    Affects Drink  1  Chance  30 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger dads_more_drunk_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait Drink >= 3
          and FatherTrait Drink <= 4

    Affects Sobriety  9  Chance  75 
    Affects BlackBileHumour  1  Chance  20 
    Affects Drink  1  Chance  30 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger dads_totally_drunk_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait Drink >= 5
          and FatherTrait Drink <= 6

    Affects Sobriety  18  Chance  90 
    Affects YellowBileHumour  1  Chance  20 
    Affects Drink  1  Chance  30 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_hunting_temple

    Affects GoodAmbusher  1  Chance  10 
    Affects PublicFaith  1  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger temple_of_justice_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_justice_temple

    Affects HarshJustice  1  Chance  10 
    Affects PublicFaith  1  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger temple_of_leadership_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_leadership_temple

    Affects StrategicSkill  1  Chance  10 
    Affects Trusting  1  Chance  10 
    Affects PublicFaith  1  Chance  5

    Affects ReligiousMania  1  Chance  4 
    Affects Pious  1  Chance  4

Trigger luxurious_lifestyle1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_love_awesome_temple

    Affects Aesthetic  1  Chance  5 
    Affects Epicurean  1  Chance  5 
    Affects ExpensiveTastes  1  Chance  5 
    Affects Gambling  1  Chance  3 
    Affects Girls  1  Chance  3

          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists = governors_house
          and RandomPercent > 50

    Affects Pragmatic  1  Chance  2

          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and InBarbarianLands
          and RandomPercent > 90

    Affects Ignorance  1  Chance  1 
    Affects Pragmatic  1  Chance  2 
    Affects Stoic  1  Chance  1

          and RemainingMPPercentage <= 1
          and Attribute Management >= 3

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and Trait Ignorance < 1
          and Trait Insane <= 1

    Affects PhilosophySkill  1  Chance  1 
    Affects NaturalPhilosophySkill  1  Chance  1 
    Affects RhetoricSkill  1  Chance  1 
    Affects GoodEngineer  1  Chance  1

    Condition GovernorInResidence
          and BuildingQueueIdleDespiteCash

    Affects BadBuilder  1  Chance  3

    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted

    Condition GovernorInResidence

    Affects GoodBuilder  1  Chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger hate_n_fear1
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and GeneralFoughtCulture roman

    Affects HatesRoman  1  Chance  40 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and GeneralFoughtCulture greek

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle > 0.3

    Affects BattleScarred  1  Chance  30 
    Affects Brave  1  Chance  15

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle > 0.3
          and Trait Berserker >= 1

    Affects Berserker  1  Chance  30 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle > 0.3
          and CultureType roman

    Affects RomanHero  1  Chance  15

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 6

    Affects Brave  1  Chance  20

    Condition GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 6
          and CultureType roman

    Affects RomanHero  1  Chance  20

    Affects Brave  1  Chance  20

          and CultureType roman

          and PercentageEnemyKilled = 0

          and Trait GoodSpy <= 2

    Affects Deranged  1  Chance  10

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition AgentType = admiral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleOdds < 2.25

    Affects Sailor  1  Chance  100

          and not WonBattle
          and BattleOdds > 1.5

    Affects FixingAdmiral  1  Chance  100 
    Affects Landlubber  1  Chance  100

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and Treasury > 50000

    Affects Corrupt  1  Chance  3 
    Affects Aesthetic  1  Chance  3 
    Affects ExpensiveTastes  1  Chance  3 
    Affects Epicurean  1  Chance  3 
    Affects BadAdministrator  1  Chance  3

          and Treasury > 100000

    Affects Aesthetic  1  Chance  3

    Affects Epicurean  1  Chance  3

          and not IsFactionLeader

    Condition IsFactionLeader
          and Trait Factionheir = 1

    Affects Exheir  1  Chance  100

          and IsFactionLeader

    Affects Exheir  -1  Chance  100

    Affects Factionheir  1  Chance  100

Trigger dads_InspiringSpeaker
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait InspiringSpeaker >= 1

    Affects RhetoricSkill  1  Chance  20 
    Affects InspiringSpeaker  1  Chance  20 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger dads_Intelligent1
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait Intelligent >= 1

    Affects Intelligent  1  Chance  50 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger dads_Intelligent2
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait Intelligent >= 2

    Affects Intelligent  1  Chance  50 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger dads_Intelligent3
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait Intelligent >= 3

    Affects Intelligent  1  Chance  50 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger selfperpetuating49
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition Trait Pragmatic >= 1

    Affects Pragmatic  1  Chance  4 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition Trait Pious >= 1

    Affects Pious  1  Chance  4 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition Trait PublicAtheism >= 1

    Affects PublicAtheism  1  Chance  4 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition Trait PublicFaith >= 1

    Affects PublicFaith  1  Chance  4 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger WonDefeat_t_k01
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle

    Affects Anger  1  Chance  3 
    Affects BadCommander  1  Chance  3 
    Affects PublicAtheism  1  Chance  3 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger WonDefeat_t_k02
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and I_ConflictType SuccessfulAmbush

    Affects GoodAmbusher  1  Chance  15 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger WonDefeat_t_k03
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and I_ConflictType SuccessfulAmbush

    Affects BadAmbusher  1  Chance  25 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and I_ConflictType SuccessfulAmbush

    Affects GoodAmbusher  1  Chance  3 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and I_ConflictType FailedAmbush

    Affects BadAmbusher  1  Chance  3 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger WonDefeat_t_k06
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle

    Affects GoodAttacker  1  Chance  3 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger WonDefeat_t_k07
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle

    Affects BadAttacker  1  Chance  3 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and PercentageUnitCategory cavalry > 50

    Affects GoodCavalryGeneral  1  Chance  3 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and PercentageUnitCategory cavalry > 50

    Affects BadCavalryGeneral  1  Chance  3 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger WonDefeat_t_k10
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition not WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle

    Affects GoodDefender  1  Chance  3 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger WonDefeat_t_k11
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition not WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle

    Affects BadDefender  1  Chance  3 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger WonDefeat_t_k12
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsUnderSiege
          and IsGeneral
          and I_ConflictType Siege
          and TotalSiegeWeapons = 0

    Affects BadEngineer  1  Chance  3 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger WonDefeat_t_k13
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsUnderSiege
          and IsGeneral
          and I_ConflictType Siege
          and TotalSiegeWeapons > 0

    Affects GoodEngineer  1  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------

          and GovernorLoyaltyLevel = loyalty_happy

          and GovernorLoyaltyLevel = loyalty_happy
          and IsGeneral

Trigger BuildingCompleted_t_k01
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted

    Condition not SettlementBuildingFinished = farms+1
          and not SettlementBuildingExists >= farms+1
          and SettlementBuildingExists = farms
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= governors_villa

    Affects BadFarmer  1  Chance  20 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted

    Condition SettlementBuildingFinished = farms+3

    Affects GoodFarmer  2  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted

    Condition SettlementBuildingFinished = farms+4

    Affects GoodFarmer  5  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

          and not SettlementBuildingExists >= market

          and SettlementBuildingExists >= governors_villa

    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted

    Condition not SettlementBuildingFinished = mines+1
          and not SettlementBuildingExists >= mines+1
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= governors_villa
          and SettlementBuildingExists = mines
          and not CultureType barbarian

    Affects BadMiner  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger BuildingCompleted_t_k08
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted

    Condition not SettlementBuildingFinished = academy
          and not SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= governors_palace
          and not CultureType barbarian

    Affects Ignorance  1  Chance  20 

;------------------------------------------

          and not SettlementBuildingExists >= forum
          and SettlementBuildingExists = market
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= governors_palace

Trigger AgentsMission_t_k01
    WhenToTest SufferAssassinationAttempt

    Condition IsGeneral

    Affects Anger  1  Chance  3 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger ComesOfAge_t_k01
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition CultureType barbarian

    Affects Ignorance  5  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger ComesOfAge_t_k02
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge


    Affects Scout  2  Chance  4 
    Affects Noctophilia  2  Chance  4 
    Affects Noctophobia  2  Chance  4 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger DiplomacyMission_t_k01
    WhenToTest DiplomacyMission

    Condition MissionSucceeded
          and CultureType roman

    Affects ForeignTastesRomanVice  1  Chance  50 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger DiplomacyMission_t_k02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition AgentType = diplomat
          and Trait ForeignTastesRomanVice > 0
          and CultureType roman

    Affects ForeignTastesRomanVice  -1  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest DiplomacyMission

    Condition MissionSucceeded
          and CultureType barbarian

Trigger DiplomacyMission_t_k20
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

    Condition AgentType = diplomat

    Affects LaxPersonalSecuity  1  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger DiplomacyMission_t_k21
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition AgentType = diplomat
          and CultureType barbarian
          and not InBarbarianLands

    Affects HighPersonalSecurity  1  Chance  3 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger DiplomacyMission_t_k22
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition AgentType = diplomat
          and not CultureType barbarian
          and InBarbarianLands

    Affects HighPersonalSecurity  1  Chance  3 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger GovernorTrained_t_k01
    WhenToTest GovernorAgentCreated
    Condition TrainedAgentType = assassin
          and IsGeneral

    Affects AssassinMaster  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger GovernorTrained_t_k02
    WhenToTest GovernorUnitTrained
    Condition TrainedUnitCategory siege
          and IsGeneral

    Affects GoodEngineer  1  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger GovernorTrained_t_k03
    WhenToTest GovernorUnitTrained
    Condition TrainedUnitCategory cavalry
          and IsGeneral

    Affects GoodCavalryGeneral  1  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger GovernorTrained_t_k04
    WhenToTest GovernorUnitTrained
    Condition TrainedUnitCategory infantry
          and IsGeneral

    Affects GoodInfantryGeneral  1  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger GovernorTrained_t_k05
    WhenToTest GovernorUnitTrained
    Condition IsGeneral

    Affects cheaper_training_squads  1  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger GovernorTrained_t_k06
    WhenToTest HireMercenaries

    Affects rise_training_squads  1  Chance  7 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger GovernorTrader_t_k01
    WhenToTest SettlementTurnEnd

    Condition GovernorInResidence
          and not IsUnderSiege
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= trader
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= roads
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= port
          and IsGeneral

    Affects GoodTrader  1  Chance  15 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger GovernorTrader_t_k02
    WhenToTest SettlementTurnEnd

    Condition GovernorInResidence
          and not IsUnderSiege
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= trader
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= caravan
          and IsGeneral

    Affects GoodTrader  1  Chance  15 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger GovernorTrader_t_k03
    WhenToTest SettlementTurnEnd

    Condition GovernorInResidence
          and IsUnderSiege
          and IsGeneral

    Affects BadTrader  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger GovernorTrader_t_k04
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

    Condition RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= farms
          and IsGeneral

    Affects GoodFarmer  1  Chance  15 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger GovernorTrader_t_k05
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition not EndedInSettlement
          and IsGeneral

    Affects BadFarmer  1  Chance  5 
    Affects BadTrader  1  Chance  5 
    Affects BadMiner  1  Chance  7 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger GovernorTrader_t_k06
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

    Condition RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= mines
          and IsGeneral

    Affects GoodMiner  1  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger temple_of_love_t_k01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

    Condition RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_love_temple
          and Trait Anger > 0

    Affects Anger  -1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger temple_of_love_t_k02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

    Condition RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_love_temple
          and Trait Bloodthirsty > 0

    Affects Bloodthirsty  -1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger temple_of_fertility_t_k01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

    Condition RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_fertility_temple
          and Trait Arse > 0

    Affects Arse  -1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger temple_of_leadership_t_k01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

    Condition RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_leadership_temple
          and Trait BadDisciplinarian > 0

    Affects BadDisciplinarian  -1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger temple_of_fun_t_k01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

    Condition RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_fun_temple
          and Trait BlackBileHumour > 0

    Affects BlackBileHumour  -1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger temple_of_healing_t_k01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

    Condition RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_healing_temple
          and Trait Deranged > 0

    Affects Deranged  -1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger temple_of_healing_t_k02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

    Condition RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_healing_temple
          and Trait Drink > 0

    Affects Drink  -1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger temple_of_healing_t_k03
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

    Condition RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_healing_temple
          and Trait Inbred > 0

    Affects Inbred  -1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger temple_of_healing_t_k04
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

    Condition RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_healing_temple
          and Trait Insane > 0

    Affects Insane  -1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger temple_of_law_t_k01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

    Condition RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_law_temple
          and Trait Embezzler > 0

    Affects Embezzler  -1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger temple_of_governors_t_k01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

    Condition RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_governors_temple
          and Trait ExpensiveTastes > 0

    Affects ExpensiveTastes  -1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger temple_of_one_god_t_k01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

    Condition RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_one_god_temple
          and Trait Gambling > 0

    Affects Gambling  -1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger temple_of_battle_t_k01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

    Condition RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_battle_temple
          and Trait Haemophobic > 0

    Affects Haemophobic  -1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger temple_of_violence_t_k01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

    Condition RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_violence_temple
          and Trait Lewd > 0

    Affects Lewd  -1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger temple_of_violence_t_k02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

    Condition RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_violence_temple
          and Trait Perverted > 0

    Affects Perverted  -1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger trigger_tolerant_temple_of_naval
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
    Condition IsGeneral
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_naval_temple
          and not FactionType romans_scipii

    Affects tolerant  1  Chance  8 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger inheritance_t_k01
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait GoodCommander = 5

    Affects CommandersBanner  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger inheritance_t_k02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait CommandersBanner = 0
          and FatherTrait GoodCommander = 5

    Affects CommandersBanner  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

Trigger inheritance_t_k03
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait GoodAttacker = 5

    Affects CommandersSword  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait CommandersSword = 0
          and FatherTrait GoodAttacker = 5

    Affects CommandersSword  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait GoodDefender = 5

    Affects CommandersShield  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait CommandersShield = 0
          and FatherTrait GoodDefender = 5

    Affects CommandersShield  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait GoodAdministrator = 3
          and FatherTrait career_Count_GP >= 4

    Affects GovernorsSignet  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait GovernorsSignet = 0
          and FatherTrait GoodAdministrator = 3
          and FatherTrait career_Count_GP >= 4

    Affects GovernorsSignet  1  Chance  100

          and Trait GovernorsSignet = 0

          and FatherTrait SideDynasty_armenia = 1

    Condition IsGeneral

    Affects AdoptedDynasty  1  Chance  100

    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait AdoptedDynasty = 0
